MAIN-CARROUSEL1: Take care of your pet from your cell phone
MAIN-CARROUSEL2: I chose the plan that suits you
FOOTER-LEYEND: Follow your dog or feline friend from the comfort of your cell phone thanks to Geo PET. Register your pet with its Geotag number to see its exact location, at all times.
CONTACT-MSJ: Write here your comment or message
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH1: You can visualize all your pets at the same time in the same place.
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH2: More precise so that you know at all times where your pet is
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH3: So that you do not sleep and remember that your pet also deserves his moment of disconnection
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH4: So that your card is up to date, to receive news about research and news that will make your pet's life healthier.
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH5: That your pet respects the schedules of his meal is essential for his good health.
ABOUT-PARAGRAPH6: Enjoy up to 50% off in selected stores.
ABOUT-TESTIMONIAL-SUB: WHAT OUR USERS SAY ABOUT US
ABOUT-TESTIMONIAL1: Great, it is an application where you will find what you need for your pet. It is an excellent option. I recommend it 100%
ABOUT-TESTIMONIAL2: I loved it! The attention was excellent, the accuracy of the GPS and the records of the veterinarian made my life easier. Thank you GeoPet!
ABOUT-TESTIMONIAL3: Very good app, everything I need for my pets. I recommend it, it has excellent service. It's super useful!
ABOUT-TESTIMONIAL4: Very good service, very good idea. Super satisfied with my premium subscription.
